title: Trend Micro Buys TippingPoint; With One Bold Move, A Sleeping Giant Awakens
text: October 22,   Intelligence Report Trend Microâ€™s TippingPoint buy complements its cloud, data center and breach-detection offerings with a full line of network defense products. Plus it is the bold, high-profile move Trend Micro customers have long been waiting to see.
